## Load the dataset

Firstly, we can load the dataset obtained through the previous steps in the capstone project. These steps are outlined in the README.md file.

```{r cars}
PData <- read.delim("~/Coursera Capstone/PData.txt", stringsAsFactors=TRUE)
EData <- read.delim("~/Coursera Capstone/featureCount-data-ENTREZ.txt")
```
